result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua M Buford was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joshua M Buford is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Joshua M Buford was found guilty of Felony Murder - Battery, an unclassified felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.03.
  • Joshua M Buford was found guilty of Possession of Firearm by Felon, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant is required to provide a DNA sample to the State Crime Lab, pursuant to 973.046 & 973.047.
